snippet: Michael McFaul said that Russian agents were tapping his telephone as well as that of his wife.
abstract: Michael McFaul, who finished his tour as President Obama’s envoy in Moscow in February, says he was constantly followed, harassed and demonized on state television and was shadowed wherever he went; says he believes the Russian agents are still tapping his telephone as well as that of his wife.
lead_paragraph: Michael McFaul said that Russian agents were tapping his telephone as well as that of his wife.

headline.main: Former U.S. Envoy to Moscow Says Russians Are Still Spying on Him
headline.print_headline: Ex-Envoy Says He Is Spied On by Moscow
